summary: The diff modifies backend/main.mo and project_state.json. The backend file is truncated so full content of Dave Clarke's 9 events cannot be fully verified, but the structure appears present. The frontend file frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts is not included in the diff at all, meaning REQ-107 cannot be confirmed as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: In frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts, update entries for Dave Clarke's 9 events to match corrected venue strings and dateTimes (Vancouver, Toronto, Brighton, Cardiff), remove stale composite keys, so Add to Radar functionality works correctly.
missing_requirements.reason: The file frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts is not present in the diff at all â€” neither added nor modified. There is no evidence this file was updated.

hallucinated_features.description: The postupgrade system hook calls _forceSeedData() directly instead of initializeSeedData(), and a separate admin-gated public initializeSeedData function is introduced as a wrapper.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request requires postupgrade to call initializeSeedData unconditionally, but the diff shows postupgrade calling _forceSeedData() instead. This structural refactoring was not requested and deviates from the specified constraint.
